Name: Hologram Flame Wolf Riding
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Hologram Flame Wolf that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
You can move at a very high speed on a Hologram Flame Wolf Riding that can double-jump. Double-click the desired location on the world map to automatically fly to the destination by following the GPS. (Automatic flights are only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. Purchase a flight permit from Instructor Irvin to expand the smart riding permit continent.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Hologram Flame Wolf that can double-jump to travel very fast.
